  • Constructor Details

    • Qubit

      public Qubit()
      Creates a qubit. The qubit will be in the |0> state

    • Qubit

      public Qubit(double ralpha)
      Creates a qubit with an initial value for alpha. The initial state of the qubit is ralpha |0> + (1-ralpha^2)^(1/2) |1>
      Parameters:
      ralpha - the real part of the alpha coefficient in alfa |0> + beta |1>

      public int measure()
      Performs a measurement on this qubit.
      Returns:
      0 or 1
